claims: The WHO reported that childhood measles cases rose 30% worldwide in 2023.

claimSourcePicks.claim: The WHO reported that childhood measles cases rose 30% worldwide in 2023.

sources.title: Global measles cases up 20% in 2023 - The Lancet
sources.why: “In 2023, global measles cases increased by 30% compared to the previous year.” — Progress Toward Measles Elimination — Worldwide, 2000–2023 - NIH; “The WHO reported that childhood measles cases rose 30% worldwide in 2023.” — Measles Cases and Outbreaks - CDC.
